sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{a }{p } = \frac{b }{q } = \frac{c }{r }
\]
Then show that 
\[
	\frac{a ^3 }{p ^3} + \frac{b ^3 }{q ^3} + \frac{c ^3}{r ^3} = \frac{3abc }{pqr }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{a }{p } = \frac{b }{q } = \frac{c }{r } = s \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow a = ps , b = qs , c = rs 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, left hand side of the equation can be written as 
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{a ^3 }{p ^3} + \frac{b ^3 }{q ^3} + \frac{c ^3}{r ^3}
\]
\[
	= \frac{(ps )^3}{p ^3} + \frac{(qs )^3}{q ^3} + \frac{(rs )^3}{r ^3} 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "\[
	= s ^3 + s ^3 + s ^3 = 3 s ^3
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, right hand side of the equation can be written as
\[
\textrm{RHS } = \frac{3 abc }{pqr }
\]
\[
= \frac{3 (ps )(qs )(rs )}{pqr }
\]
\[
= 3s ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From the above two expressions, we can see that
\[
\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{After assumption $\frac{a }{p } = \frac{b }{q} = \frac{c }{r } = s$ and taking terms separately we get $a = ps , b = qs , c = rs$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking LHS, and substituting the value of $a$, $b$, and $c$, in the LHS we get $\frac{(ps )^3}{p ^3} + \frac{(qs )^3}{q ^3} + \frac{(rs )^3}{r ^3}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{"Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $s ^3 + s ^3 + s ^3 = 3 s ^3$}"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking RHS, and substituting the value of $a$, $b$, and $c$, in the RHS we get $\frac{3(ps)(qs)(rs)}{pqr}=3s^2$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
